subject: Re: [cc-community] Multinational Profit Day
body:
On Sun, 2007-04-29 at 09:53 -0400, drew Roberts wrote:> On Sunday 29 April 2007 06:18 am, David Berry wrote:> > > Sony\u2019s YouTube competitor - CC licensed> > >> > > Sony has launched its YouTube competitor - eyeVio. By default,  > > > uploads are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY)  > > > license.
> I have poked around and what I can't determine so far is do they give the > option for BY-SA.
You can choose any of the six main CC licenses.  This may have alwaysbeen the case -- all of the videos I looked at when the site launchedwere under BY and I didn't try going through the process untilyesterday.
Now there is lots of non-BY stuff up.  I'll post a screenshot of the(Japanese only) license choosing interface tomorrow.
